A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Avid StarWars fan for almost (40) years. This movie confused me. Hardly any questions were answered    Like what is Snoke's story\, what happened between Han and Leia\, I don't believe that Rey's parents are no one. 

I don't want to ruin the movie if you haven't seen but I feel the plot was horrible. There is scene with Leia that I am pretty sure was either a Green Lantern or Mary Poppins reference. It made zero sense to me. 

There are some really good parts to the movie so it is not all bad. I highly recommend waiting for video.  Bad Disney. Bad.
